item.title: Blocked chute, 21st October
item.description:

item.title: Tall wooden barriers for roadworks creating a maze of narrow passageways in a dangerous area, 20th October
item.description:
The tall wooden barriers surrounding the roadworks in this area have suddenly become connected, creating inescapable narrow passages of some length with various total blocks near tesco and Ma La. There has been no explanation for the need for these barriers, and I can see no temporary structure notices. Are the council aware they exist? Either way, given the amount of antisocial behaviour in the area (my child and I were recently assaulted on the way to her school at 8.40 am) this maze of narrow passages feels like a muggers paradise.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Monck Street, Millbank, London
Report on FixMyStreet
